examples.description: uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes

examples.description: sets the header to a height of 100px
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors sets the header to a height of 100px
Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors sets the bottom-border to 1px solid #cccccc

examples.description: floats the nav to the right with a nested selector of "header nav"
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors floats the nav to the right with a nested selector of "header nav"

examples.description: removes the padding from the nav ul with a nested selector of "nav ul"
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors removes the padding from the nav ul with a nested selector of "nav ul"

examples.description: resets the margin for the nav ul to a 40px top margin with a nested selector of "nav ul"
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors resets the margin for the nav ul to a 40px top margin with a nested selector of "nav ul"

examples.description: sets the display of a navigation li to inline with a nested selector of "nav ul li"
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors sets the display of a navigation li to inline with a nested selector of "nav ul li"

examples.description: adds a 10px margin to the right of a nav li with a nested selector of 'nav ul li'
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors adds a 10px margin to the right of a nav li with a nested selector of 'nav ul li'

examples.description: styles the navigation links with a nested selector of "nav a"
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors styles the navigation links with a nested selector of "nav a"

examples.description: floats the h3 within the header to the left with a nested element selector of header h3
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors floats the h3 within the header to the left with a nested element selector of header h3

examples.description: makes the font-size of h3 within the header 30px with a nested element selector of header h3
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors makes the font-size of h3 within the header 30px with a nested element selector of header h3

examples.description: styles the link in the header with a nested selected of header h3 a
examples.full_description: Styling the header and navigation with nested selectors styles the link in the header with a nested selected of header h3 a
